categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ra'vek was a female Sith Lord who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. During the war she was stationed on board the Vaiken Spacedock space station within the Imperial fleet, where she sold equipment to other Imperials in the supplies section of the station. Ra'vek wore a black and purple set of armor including a helmet while working.

Ra'vek was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game she serves as an Imperial ultimate gear vendor within the Imperial fleet. She was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
